verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that came to \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* the \w Morasthite|strong="H4183"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*, \add and\add* \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which he \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* concerning \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, all ye \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w*, O \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and all that \w therein|strong="H4393"\w* is: and let the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* be \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* against you, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* from his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.\f + \fr 1.2 \ft all ye…: Heb. ye people, all of them\f*\f + \fr 1.2 \ft all that…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*

For, behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and will come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* upon the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* shall be \w molten|strong="H4549"\w* under him, and the \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w* shall be \w cleft|strong="H1234"\w*, as \w wax|strong="H1749"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \add and\add* as the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \add that are\add* \w poured|strong="H5064"\w* down a steep \w place|strong="H4174"\w*.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft a steep…: Heb. a descent\f*

For the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \add is\add* all this, and for the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. What \add is\add* the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*? \add is it\add* not \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*? and what \add are\add* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*? \add are they\add* not \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*?

Therefore I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* as an \w heap|strong="H5856"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \add and\add* as \w plantings|strong="H4302"\w* of a \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*: and I will pour \w down|strong="H5064"\w* the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* thereof into the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*, and I will \w discover|strong="H1540"\w* the \w foundations|strong="H3247"\w* thereof.

And all the graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w* thereof shall be beaten to \w pieces|strong="H3807"\w*, and all the \w hires|strong="H0868"\w* thereof shall be \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* with the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and all the \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* thereof will I \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*: for she \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \add it\add* of the \w hire|strong="H0868"\w* of an \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, and they shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w hire|strong="H0868"\w* of an \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*.

Therefore I will \w wail|strong="H5594"\w* and \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w stripped|strong="H7758"\w* and \w naked|strong="H6174"\w*: I will \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w wailing|strong="H4553"\w* like the \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w*, and \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* as the \w owls|strong="H1323"\w*.\f + \fr 1.8 \ft owls: Heb. daughters of the owl\f*

For her \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* \add is\add* \w incurable|strong="H0605"\w*; for it is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; he is \w come|strong="H5060"\w* unto the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft her…: or, she is grievously sick of her wounds\f*

¶ \w Declare|strong="H5046"\w* ye \add it\add* not at \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* ye not at \w all|strong="H1058"\w*: in the house of \w Aphrah|strong="H1036"\w* \w roll|strong="H6428"\w* thyself in the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.\f + \fr 1.10 \ft Aphrah: that is, Dust\f*

Pass ye \w away|strong="H5674"\w*, thou \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Saphir|strong="H8208"\w*, having thy \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* \w naked|strong="H6181"\w*: the \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Zaanan|strong="H6630"\w* came not \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w mourning|strong="H4553"\w* of \w Beth-ezel|strong="H1018"\w*; he shall \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* of you his \w standing|strong="H5979"\w*.\f + \fr 1.11 \ft thou…: or, thou that dwellest fairly\f*\f + \fr 1.11 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*\f + \fr 1.11 \ft Zaanan: or, The country of flocks\f*\f + \fr 1.11 \ft Beth-ezel: or, A place near\f*

For the \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Maroth|strong="H4796"\w* waited \w carefully|strong="H2342"\w* for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: but \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 1.12 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*\f + \fr 1.12 \ft waited…: or, was grieved\f*

O thou \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, \w bind|strong="H7573"\w* the \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* to the swift \w beast|strong="H7409"\w*: she \add is\add* the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* to the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: for the \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in thee.\f + \fr 1.13 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*

Therefore shalt thou \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w presents|strong="H7964"\w* to \w Moresheth-gath|strong="H4182"\w*: the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Achzib|strong="H0392"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w lie|strong="H0391"\w* to the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 1.14 \ft to…: or, for Moresheth-gath\f*\f + \fr 1.14 \ft Achzib: that is, A lie\f*

Yet will I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* an \w heir|strong="H3423"\w* unto thee, O \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w*: he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 1.15 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*\f + \fr 1.15 \ft he…: or, the glory of Israel shall, etc\f*

Make thee \w bald|strong="H7139"\w*, and \w poll|strong="H1494"\w* thee for thy \w delicate|strong="H8588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*; \w enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w* as the \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*; for they are gone into \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* from thee.
